activities.name: Visit Ñu Guazú Park
activities.address: Ruta Mcal. Estigarribia, Luque (near Silvio Pettirossi Airport)
activities.description: A large green space perfect for picnics, jogging, or relaxing. It has walking trails, playgrounds, and open fields.

activities.name: Explore the Museo del Aviación (Aviation Museum)
activities.address: Av. Aeropuerto Internacional, Luque (inside the Air Force base)
activities.description: A must-visit for aviation enthusiasts, featuring historic planes, military aircraft, and Paraguay’s aeronautical history.

activities.name: Shop at Mercado de Luque (Luque Market)
activities.description: Famous for leather goods (especially handmade soccer balls), crafts, and traditional Paraguayan souvenirs.

activities.name: Try Authentic Paraguayan Food at Lido Bar
activities.description: A classic spot to try sopa paraguaya, chipá, and mbejú—best enjoyed with tereré (cold herbal tea).

activities.name: Watch a Soccer Match at Estadio Defensores del Chaco
activities.description: Paraguay’s national stadium hosts thrilling matches—home to the national team and local clubs.

activities.name: Visit Casa de la Cultura (House of Culture)
activities.address: Av. San Blas, Luque (near City Hall)
activities.description: Hosts art exhibitions, folk music, and cultural events showcasing Paraguayan traditions.

activities.name: Day Trip to Areguá
activities.address: Areguá, Central Department (30 min from Luque)
activities.description: A charming colonial town with artisan shops, ceramics, and Lake Ypacaraí views.

activities.name: Experience Nightlife on Avenida San Blas
activities.address: Av. San Blas, Luque (main nightlife strip)
activities.description: Bars, live music (polka & guarania), and karaoke spots for a fun night out.
